person.persName: Benjamin B. Weidler, Sr. (Covington, Kentucky, cigar store owner)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, cigar store owner. Pennsylvania native. Married to Sarah A. Wayman Weidler. Father of Lenora Weidler, Henrietta Weidler, Laura Weidler, Mary B. Weidler, Rial C. Weidler, Sallie Weidler, Benjamin B. Weidler, Jr., John W. Weidler, and Jesse B. Weidler. Tobacconist in Covington in 1850. Cigar store owner in Covington in 1860.
